last_episode_to_air.name: The Ark of Sirius
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mikhail confronts Yevgraf, but he's already consumed the Ark. With Yuliy and Willard aboard, the airship flies toward the final confrontation.

name: Sirius the Jaeger
overview: Imperial Capital, 1930. A strange group of people carrying musical instrument cases landed on Tokyo station. They are called the "Jaegers", who came to hunt vampires. Amongst them, there stood a young man with striking serenity and unusual aura. His name is Yuliy, a werewolf whose home village was destroyed by vampires. Yuliy and the Jaegers engage in deadly battle over a mysterious holy arc only known as "The Arc of Sirius". What truth awaits them at the end...?

episodes.name: The Revenant Howls in Darkness
episodes.overview: Yuliy and the Jaegers plan an assault on a vampire meeting in Shanghai, then follow the ringleaders across the sea to Tokyo.

episodes.name: Deprived Talent
episodes.overview: After Agatha's attack, Yuliy recovers at the house of a doctor conducting advanced research. Agatha hasn't given up yet.

episodes.name: Indelible Memories
episodes.overview: Shaken by his encounter with one of the vampires during the attack, Yuliy recalls his childhood and how he came to meet Willard.

episodes.name: Beginning of Trickery
episodes.overview: The team investigates the researcher's death, and Willard crosses paths with a secret agent. Yuliy and Dorothea head to Shizuoka.

episodes.name: The Frankenstein
episodes.overview: Aboard the train, Yuliy meets someone he thought was dead: his brother. When a group of bandits attacks the train, they make a strange discovery.

episodes.name: Mokingbird's Song
episodes.overview: The vampires determine that the Ark of Sirius isn't in Tokyo, but they still have one task left in the city. Willard learns something urgent at the bar.

episodes.name: True Confession
episodes.overview: The military interrupts the vampire assault on the mansion. Mikhail and then Kershner tell Yuliy about the Ark and how it relates to his past.

episodes.name: The Sanctuary of Sirius
episodes.overview: Alone, Yuliy heads to southern Karafuto/Sakhalin on the trail of the Ark of Sirius. His brother and the vampire prince Yevgraf are already there.

episodes.name: Father's Shadow
episodes.overview: Yuliy and Bishop meet an old man who knew Yuliy's father, Alexei, but he refuses to say anything further. In town, they run into Ryoko and Iba.

episodes.name: Memories of the Abyss
episodes.overview: Willard and the Jaegers find an artifact related to the Ark and set out after Yuliy, who's almost reached both the sanctuary of the Ark and his father.

episodes.name: Calling in Blood
episodes.overview: As Willard and the Jaegers fly towards Karafuto, Bishop makes his move. With Ryoko and Iba as backup, Yuliy confronts the vampires and his brother.

episodes.name: The Ark of Sirius
episodes.overview: Mikhail confronts Yevgraf, but he's already consumed the Ark. With Yuliy and Willard aboard, the airship flies toward the final confrontation.
